name: Amalga
description:
In Amalga, you play as a bounty hunter tasked with eliminating all of the mechanized targets. Fly through space performing daring combat manuevers, dispatching waves of enemies, and taking down large mechs.

This was a Final Student Project for our time at Full Sail University.

Designers : Tony Beam,  Ray Jacobson, Jarod Marty-Kennedy, Trevor Maye,  Cooper Schneider, Ethan Shin, Enrique Villarreal Vargas
